attributes.action: introduce a windfall tax of 100% on bonuses paid to senior bank executives in the upcoming budget.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If banks are contractually obliged to pay exorbitant bonuses with money given to them by the taxpayers, then the Government should claim it back through the tax system, because, as everyone knows, bankers do not deserve to receive any money for their greed and incompetence.
